00020 #include "../constraints/constraint_abstract.h"
00021 
00022 #ifndef VARREFTYPE_H
00023 #define VARREFTYPE_H
00024 
00025 // The follow two types are designed to allow turning a variable type which
00026 // must be fed to a container, into a stand-alone class which is ready to be
00027 // used as a variable.
00028 template<typename InternalRefType>
00029 struct VarRefType
00030 {
00031   static const BOOL isBool = InternalRefType::isBool;
00032   static const BoundType isBoundConst = InternalRefType::isBoundConst;
00033 
00034   InternalRefType data;
00035   
00036   BOOL isBound() const
00037   { return data.isBound();}
00038   
00039   VarRefType(const InternalRefType& _data) : data(_data)
00040   {}
00041   
00042   VarRefType() : data()
00043   {}
00044   
00045   VarRefType(const VarRefType& b) : data(b.data)
00046   {}
00047   
00048   BOOL isAssigned() const
00049   { return GET_CONTAINER().isAssigned(data); }
00050   
00051   DomainInt getAssignedValue() const
00052   { return GET_CONTAINER().getAssignedValue(data); }
00053   
00054   BOOL isAssignedValue(DomainInt i) const
00055   { 
00056     return GET_CONTAINER().isAssigned(data) &&
00057     GET_CONTAINER().getAssignedValue(data) == i;
00058   }
00059   
00060   BOOL inDomain(DomainInt b) const
00061   { return GET_CONTAINER().inDomain(data, b); }
00062 
00063   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(DomainInt b) const
00064   { return GET_CONTAINER().inDomain_noBoundCheck(data, b); }
00065   
00066   DomainInt getMax() const
00067   { return GET_CONTAINER().getMax(data); }
00068   
00069   DomainInt getMin() const
00070   { return GET_CONTAINER().getMin(data); }
00071 
00072   DomainInt getInitialMax() const
00073   { return GET_CONTAINER().getInitialMax(data); }
00074   
00075   DomainInt getInitialMin() const
00076   { return GET_CONTAINER().getInitialMin(data); }
00077   
00078   void setMax(DomainInt i)
00079   { GET_CONTAINER().setMax(data,i); }
00080   
00081   void setMin(DomainInt i)
00082   { GET_CONTAINER().setMin(data,i); }
00083   
00084   void uncheckedAssign(DomainInt b)
00085   { GET_CONTAINER().uncheckedAssign(data, b); }
00086   
00087   void propagateAssign(DomainInt b)
00088   { GET_CONTAINER().propagateAssign(data, b); }
00089   
00090   void decisionAssign(DomainInt b)
00091   { GET_CONTAINER().decisionAssign(data, b); }
00092   
00093   void removeFromDomain(DomainInt b)
00094   { GET_CONTAINER().removeFromDomain(data, b); }
00095   
00096   void addTrigger(Trigger t, TrigType type)
00097   { GET_CONTAINER().addTrigger(data, t, type); }
00098 
00099   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints()
00100   { return GET_CONTAINER().getConstraints(data); }
00101 
00102   void addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c)
00103   { GET_CONTAINER().addConstraint(data, c); }
00104 
00105   DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt v) const
00106   { return GET_CONTAINER().getBaseVal(data, v); }
00107 
00108   Var getBaseVar() const
00109   { return GET_CONTAINER().getBaseVar(data); }
00110 
00111 #ifdef WDEG
00112   int getBaseWdeg()
00113   { return GET_CONTAINER().getBaseWdeg(data); }
00114 
00115   void incWdeg()
00116   { GET_CONTAINER().incWdeg(data); }
00117 #endif
00118 
00119   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const VarRefType& v)
00120   { return o << InternalRefType::name() << v.data.var_num; }
00121     
00122   int getDomainChange(DomainDelta d)
00123   { return d.XXX_get_domain_diff(); }
00124   
00125 #ifdef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00126   void addDynamicTrigger(DynamicTrigger* t, TrigType type, DomainInt pos = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF)
00127   {  GET_CONTAINER().addDynamicTrigger(data, t, type, pos BT_CALL); }
00128 #endif
00129 };
00130 
00131 
00132 template<typename GetContainer, typename InternalRefType>
00133 struct QuickVarRefType
00134 {
00135   static const BOOL isBool = InternalRefType::isBool;
00136   static const BoundType isBoundConst = InternalRefType::isBoundConst;
00137   InternalRefType data;
00138   
00139   BOOL isBound() const
00140   { return data.isBound();}
00141   
00142   QuickVarRefType(const InternalRefType& _data) : data(_data)
00143   {}
00144   
00145   QuickVarRefType() : data()
00146   {}
00147   
00148   QuickVarRefType(const QuickVarRefType& b) : data(b.data)
00149   {}
00150   
00151   BOOL isAssigned() const
00152   { return data.isAssigned(); }
00153   
00154   DomainInt getAssignedValue() const
00155   { return data.getAssignedValue(); }
00156   
00157   BOOL isAssignedValue(DomainInt i) const
00158   { 
00159     return data.isAssigned() &&
00160     data.getAssignedValue() == i;
00161   }
00162   BOOL inDomain(DomainInt b) const
00163   { return data.inDomain(b); }
00164   
00165   BOOL inDomain_noBoundCheck(DomainInt b) const
00166   { return data.inDomain_noBoundCheck(b); }
00167 
00168   DomainInt getMax() const
00169   { return data.getMax(); }
00170   
00171   DomainInt getMin() const
00172   { return data.getMin(); }
00173 
00174   DomainInt getInitialMax() const
00175   { return data.getInitialMax(); }
00176   
00177   DomainInt getInitialMin() const
00178   { return data.getInitialMin(); }
00179   
00180   void setMax(DomainInt i)
00181   { GET_CONTAINER().setMax(data,i); }
00182   
00183   void setMin(DomainInt i)
00184   { GET_CONTAINER().setMin(data,i); }
00185   
00186   void uncheckedAssign(DomainInt b)
00187   { GET_CONTAINER().uncheckedAssign(data, b); }
00188   
00189   void propagateAssign(DomainInt b)
00190   { GET_CONTAINER().propagateAssign(data, b); }
00191   
00192   void decisionAssign(DomainInt b)
00193   { GET_CONTAINER().decisionAssign(data, b); }
00194   
00195   void removeFromDomain(DomainInt b)
00196   { GET_CONTAINER().removeFromDomain(data, b); }
00197   
00198   void addTrigger(Trigger t, TrigType type)
00199   { GET_CONTAINER().addTrigger(data, t, type); }
00200 
00201   vector<AbstractConstraint*>* getConstraints()
00202   { return GET_CONTAINER().getConstraints(data); }
00203 
00204   void addConstraint(AbstractConstraint* c)
00205   { GET_CONTAINER().addConstraint(data, c); }
00206 
00207   DomainInt getBaseVal(DomainInt v) const
00208   { return data.getBaseVal(v); }
00209 
00210   Var getBaseVar() const
00211   { return data.getBaseVar(); }
00212 
00213 #ifdef WDEG
00214   int getBaseWdeg()
00215   { return GET_CONTAINER().getBaseWdeg(data); }
00216 
00217   void incWdeg()
00218   { GET_CONTAINER().incWdeg(data); }
00219 #endif
00220 
00221   friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, const QuickVarRefType& b)
00222   { return o << "Bool:" << b.data; }
00223   
00224   int getDomainChange(DomainDelta d)
00225   { return d.XXX_get_domain_diff(); }
00226   
00227 #ifdef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00228   void addDynamicTrigger(DynamicTrigger* t, TrigType type, DomainInt pos = NoDomainValue BT_FUNDEF)
00229   {  GET_CONTAINER().addDynamicTrigger(data, t, type, pos BT_CALL); }
00230 #endif
00231 };

00233 #endif
